summary.para: The RECT structure defines a rectangle by the coordinates of its upper-left and lower-right corners.

remarks.para: The RECT structure is identical to the structure.

summary.para: Specifies the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.
Specifies the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.
Specifies the x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.
Specifies the y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.
